alert.note: Alert for Anatahan; Rota; Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 02 at 5:52AM ChST until December 05 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CHST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet expected in the surf zone creating dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...North and east facing reefs of Guam, Rota, Tinian, Saipan and Agrihan. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM ChST Monday. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
